original_text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea, and they of Jerusalem, and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan, confessing their sins.
korean_text: 온 유대 지방과 예루살렘 사람이 다 나아가 자기 죄를 자복하고 요단 강에서 그에게 세례를 받더라

sentences.original_text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 유대 온 땅이 그에게 나아오며

sentences.original_text: and were all baptized of him in river of Jordan
